## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccstate">CCState</a> - This class holds information needed while lowering arguments and return values.

It captures which registers are already assigned and which stack slots are used. It provides accessors to allocate these values.

Definition at line 170 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/callingconvlower-h">CallingConvLower.h</a>.
